description: Create a video from a photo! â–«ï¸Take a photo of your product. â–«ï¸Open the photo in the CapCut app. â–«ï¸Change the aspect ratio to 9:16. â–«ï¸Increase the photo size to fill the space. â–«ï¸Extend the photo duration slightly. â–«ï¸Add the first keyframe at the beginning. â–«ï¸Rotate the photo slightly to the left with your fingers. â–«ï¸Scroll to the end and rotate the photo slightly to the right. â–«ï¸Export the video. And you have a smooth, professional-looking Reel! ğŸ«¶ Use this idea to showcase your product, highlight a new launch, or emphasize your bestseller. description: Did you know that you can get UGC work on Fiverr?  I've built my entire UGC business on Fiverr, which means I NEVER have to cold pitch to brands. They come to me.  Here's how you're gonna get started on Fiver as a UGC Creator:  Create an account.  2. Setup a UGC gig under the Video & Animation category> Social media videos.  Create a 30 second intro video with some sample work.  Publish your gig and wait for inbound requests.  Check out my pinned videos for more and if you want a step-by-step guide on how to create an OPTIMIZED UGC gig on Fiverr that has helped other UGC Creators rank on the first page, grab my UGC Fiverr Starter Kit in my Stan Store! description: Hereâ€™s a UGC video example i created for a health and wellness brand that helped me land a 1375$ ugc deal!!! Although i have never worked with Saje and simpmy created this ugc example using products i already use and love, I used this video to land mr MULTIPLE brand deals by including it in UGC pitches i sent to wellness brands.  Today, i woke up to an email from a wellness brand asking me to create only 2 VIDEOS ( 30 secs each) for 1375$!! (Iâ€™ll make a video on that soon). So even if I didnâ€™t get to work with this specific brand itself, the video I created for them still landed me multiple three figure and four figure deals. A win is a win ğŸ˜ğŸ¤·ğŸ½â€â™€ï¸ğŸ˜. Next time youâ€™re pitching a brand in a specific niche, include a link to a video example related to their niche instead of only including your portfolio and TRUST ME, youâ€™ll see a lot more success.
